New Records: Jaime Jaquez Jr. recorded his first career triple-double with 16 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists
Key Match Events: The game went into double overtime with the Sacramento Kings scoring 11 points in the second overtime, including nine by DeMar DeRozan
Post-Match Reflections: Heat head coach Erik Spoelstra mentioned that the team would learn from the tough loss and work towards a breakthrough
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Miami Heat allowed 13 offensive rebounds to Sacramento
Tyler Herro led Miami with 26 points but struggled under pressure
Bam Adebayo managed just 6-of-19 from the field
